message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CC, cs.CY, cs.CL

Reasoning: The paper discusses the application of Simplicity Theory to model interest in creative situations, which involves elements of artificial intelligence (AI) and human-computer interaction (HCI). The Poietic Generator, a simplified version of a creative game, is used as an example to demonstrate the decision rule derived from ST. Therefore, the paper could be categorized under cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CC (computational creativity), cs.CY (cybernetics), and cs.CL (computational linguistics).
